害.definition: to do harm to; to cause trouble to; harm; evil; calamity

害人.definition: to harm sb; to inflict suffering; to victimize; pernicious

害人不淺.definition: to cause a lot of trouble; to inflict much suffering

害人之心不可有，防人之心不可無.pinyin: hài rén zhī xīn bù kě yǒu ， fáng rén zhī xīn bù kě wú
害人之心不可有，防人之心不可無.definition: refrain from hurting others, yet guard against those trying to hurt you (proverb)

害人精.definition: goblin that kills or harms people; fig. wicked scoundrel; terrible pest

害喜.definition: to react to pregnancy by experiencing morning sickness or a strong appetite for certain foods

害得.definition: to cause or lead to sth bad

害怕.definition: to be afraid; to be scared

害死.definition: to kill; to cause death; to do sb to death

害病.definition: to fall sick; to contract an illness

害群之馬.definition: lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom); fig. troublemaker; black sheep; rotten apple

害臊.definition: to be bashful; to feel ashamed

害馬.definition: lit. the black horse of the herd; fig. troublemaker; the black sheep of the family

害鳥.definition: pest bird (esp. one that feeds on farm crops or newly hatched fish)
